DOC.brief_summary: This randomized phase II trial study well psychosexual intervention work patient stage I-III gynecologic breast cancer . Psychosexual intervention may improve sexual psychosocial function .
DOC.brief_title: Psychosexual Intervention Patients With Stage I-III Gynecologic Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I. Efficacy reduce severity sexual distress , difficulty , dysfunction phase II randomize clinical trial ( RCT ) . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 arm . ARM I ( Enhanced standard care ) : Patients participate enhance standard care intervention comprise stress reduction , information delivery regard gynecologic breast cancer treatment sexuality , provision survivorship care plan ( SCP ) create use OncoLink 1 hour follow baseline assessment 6 month . ARM II ( Psychological intervention ) : Patients participate individual group therapy 1.5 hour weekly 4 week , bi-weekly 8 week , monthly 2 month complete assessment interview . After completion study treatment , patient follow 3 , 6 , 9 month .
